web_snippets: Singer/songwriter, Terry Draper, is best known for his work as a member of Klaatu and co-author of 'Calling Occupants of Interplanetary Craft'.
Barry talks with Terry Draper about Klaatu, Terry's extensive solo library, the creative process, and much, much more.
After recording two non-charting singles, the band added drummer Terry Draper to the line-up; this trio constituted Klaatu throughout the rest of the band's ...
